== Link: [http://proactive.sis.pitt.edu http://proactive.sis.pitt.edu] ==\n\nProactive is an adaptive job recommender system which helps information technology-related job seekers find relevant opening jobs in the United States. The recommendation in this system is based on content. In order to take advantage of contents related to job cases, various semantic structures are being used. The system also provides comprehensive ways to explore job information, from simple navigable list of information to highly personalized recommendation. <br/>\n\n== Funding ==\nSystem development was supported by NSF ([http://www.nsf.gov/div/index.jsp?div=IIS Information & Intelligent Systems (IIS)]) through Award# [http://www.nsf.gov/awardsearch/showAward.do?AwardNumber=0447083 0447083]\n\n\n* For more information, please visit [http://proactive.sis.pitt.edu/help/index.jsp here] or contact [[User:suleehs | Danielle Lee]]\n* [[Publications]] related with Proactive\n\n[[Image:Proactive.gif|Proactive]]
